oai_dc:dc.dc:title: West Side of Public Square at 4th Avenue North and Charlotte, c.1940s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the west side of Public Square, c.1940s. Lusky's Furniture Store, Warner Drug Co., Markle's pawnbrokers, and the Army Surplus Store are visible. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
